title: [Tuts Plus] Digital Drawing 101 Drawing Animals-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Digital Drawing 101: Drawing Animals-KTR
=====================================================

PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus                
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......:  Kirk Nelson
RELEASE DATE..: 2014.08.27
RUNTIME......: 2.6H 0M


This course blends traditional drawing techniques with modern digital tools to teach you how to draw a range of animals in different illustrative styles. Get started with the fundamentals of anatomy, light and gesture that will bring your sketches to life, then move into Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator to complete your drawings by adding colour, shading and texture. Along the way you'll learn all kinds of tips, tricks and techniques from expert illustrator Kirk Nelson.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Introduction
1.2Tools and Resources


2.Drawing Fundamentals
2.1Observation and Gesture
2.2Connected Solids
2.3Light, Shadow and Details


3.How to Draw Horses
3.1See and Sketch a Horse
3.2Add Mass and Weight to Your Drawing
3.3How to Draw Hair, Highlights and Effects


4.How to Draw a Dog
4.1See and Sketch a Dog
4.2Create a Vector Portrait of a Dog
4.3Add Clean Lines and Color to Your Illustration


5.Creating a Cat Caricature
5.1See and Sketch the Cat
5.2Exaggerate Lines to Create a Cartoonish Illustration
5.3Add Shapes and Forms in Adobe Illustrator
5.4Add Base Coloring in Adobe Photoshop
5.5Add Shading and Texture to Your Illustration



6.Conclusion
6.1Conclusion
